members.name: flavorsChanged
members.comment: Invoked when the target Clipboard of the listener has changed its available DataFlavors. Some notifications may be redundant â€” they are not caused by a change of the set of DataFlavors available on the clipboard. For example, if the clipboard subsystem supposes that the system clipboard's contents has been changed but it can't ascertain whether its DataFlavors have been changed because of some exceptional condition when accessing the clipboard, the notification is sent to ensure from omitting a significant notification. Ordinarily, those redundant notifications should be occasional.

name: java.awt.datatransfer.FlavorListener
comment: Defines an object which listens for FlavorEvents.
